entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind light except west 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait early this morning. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
